title: [Duskruin Arena, Foyer]
description: Branching in either direction, the long stone corridor arches outward in a slow curve about the area that is visible up a set of stone steps, a large steel suit of armor standing to either side.  Carved into the stone overhead is the word, "DUSKRUIN".  Another smaller dark passageway angles downward toward the bowels of the arena.
paths: Obvious exits: east, south, west, down
